note: Malapropic story consultant, reformed environmental nihilist and game masterus horribulus. Mostly talks about animation development, South East Asia (photos), and TTRPGs...mostly. Posts, boosts and likes, self destruct by GM fiat.

name: Avatar description
value: The kindest caricature of me I've ever recieved, with long nose, stick outey ear,  bushy eyebrows, and brown hair, with pastelly colours and the de rigeur black t-shirt
